reviews.review: Vous avez aimé Portal ? Vous voulez en savoir plus sur cet univers ? Portal 2 développe largement l'univers mis en place par le premier opus. Le moteur physique a également été profondément amélioré. La finition est excellente et l'ambiance très bien posée.
I Love it !!! :D
Funny, witty, surprising, challenging. In one word: AWESOME.
A must have for anyone with a brain and the ability to actually use it.
BLYAT' IGRA SLOJNEE CHEM EGE NAHYU
명작
stuff shit

Fantástico, é o que eu tenho a dizer desse game. Nunca gostei de jogos estilo puzzle, mas a série "Portal" conseguiu juntar um enredo cativante com os melhores elementos de ação e aventura. Os poucos erros que o primeiro Portal tinha foram concertados, e houve a agregação de vários outros componentes como um modo co-op inédito para evitar a repetição e aumentar a vida útil da obra. Recomendo sem pensar duas vezes. Nota 10!

What a blast! I've been wanting to play Portal 2 since it got out and I just got through it (yeah, I know, busy bee). Funny and endearing (in a which-I-could-kill-you way) characters. Great game mechanics. Nice story full of whims and laughter. Interesting puzzles in grand environment. I could do a much more detailed recommandation, but I need to go try the coop levels. ;)

独特，精致，富有创造性，充满黑色幽默的杰作。
单人剧情9分，联机合作10分。
没点智商真是捉鸡啊~~

+very good plot
+very good co-op
+very good characters
+interesting story
+make some good questions after you finish the game

i cant say bad things about this game - 10/10

Portal 2...Das beste Spiel ohne Geballer!
GRAFIK:
Die Grafik ist echt beeindruckend. Die Schatten,  die Gegenstände die umher fliegen alles ist hübsch anzusehen.
STORY:
Die Story ist fantastisch. Sie erzählt etwas über Vertrauen und Freundschaft und das Ende ist das beste Ende das ich je gesehen habe. Ich hatte Gänsehaut und war nur am staunen.
SPIELZEIT:
Ich hatte das Spiel nach circa 16 Stunden durch was vollkommen passt.
COOP:
Das Spiel bietet auch einen Coop-Modus indem man mit einem Freund extra Testkammer bewältigen kann. Das ist eine gute Idee und macht echt Spaß.
FAZIT:
Der Preis von derzeit 19,99€ ist echt in Ordnung, denn jeder Cent lohnt sich. Ich bin der Meinung es ist das beste Spiel indem es nicht ums Schießen geht und überhaupt eines der besten Spiele! Danke VALVE! Kaufempfehlung von mir!:-)
GLaDOS alone is worth a playthrough. The cake is not a lie, honest!

Klasika.
Logická hra se silným a výborným příběhem, kde jsou hádanky založeny na jednoduchém a snadno pochopitelném principu. 
Game design na své maximální úrovni v praxi (a pohybu :)).
Velmi zábavná hra i pro lidi co logické hry normálně moc nemusejí s možností kooperace dvou hráčů a vytvářením vlastních úrovní.

I LOVE THIS.

I really dont have more to say.
Its just.. wow !

Portal 2 is one my favourite all time games, the storyline, the music, the graphics, and even just the way it is told is just absolutely brilliant. I would highly recommend you get this game, although if you haven't completed or played the first Portal the first bit of the storyline might be slightly confusing although it sorts of plays out as Wheatly guides you through the first hour of the game. I've fallen in love with Portal 2 and Aperture Science its ridiculous. And I hope they don't make a Portal 3 because it would just personally ruin the storyline unless thought out correctly.
You won't be disappointed when you buy this game.
This game makes you think, solve problems and most of all, overcomplicate everything! This game is so much fun and I would have no hesitation in recommending it to anyone. I love this game!

Challenging, fun and hilarious! Perfect game to play with your s/o, or just casually with a friend. Probably the best puzzle game out there, and people are developing new mods and levels every day for the ones who want to keep playing it.
Rewelacyjna gra logiczna :D
One of the best video games I've ever played. Possibly THE best. Must play!
Not quite as fun as Portal 1 and the underground section drags on too long but still pretty good.

3d puzzle game. With a portal device you can construct a two-way-portal on most surfaces. Using the portals you must get to the end of each level (chamber). On top of that there's a fun story behind it all. A great game (about 6 to 8 hours of gameplay).
It's called portal 2 because there are 2 portals.
Juegalo

Těžko porovnávat s prvním dílem, protože ten mě naprosto odrovnal. Čekal jsem suchou logickou hru a našel jsem perfektní humor s nějakou tou logikou :) Ve druhém dílu jsem tedy věděl, do čeho jdu. Nicméně ve Valve si s tím opět poradili skvěle, a tak je Portal 2 opět parádní hrou. Wheatley je naprosto boží (miluju ten britskej voiceover)a nechybí ani - už - tradiční song na konci, který opět žeru :) Ještě musím zkusit co-op :)

This game is absolutely epic. The graphics are astonishing and full-out awe inspiring. Love the game mechanics and trying to figure out all the different puzzles. Of all the games I've played, this one is totally worth it just for the experience.
If you're like me and have foolishly waited this long to play Portal 2, definitely get to it!
I love this puzzle solving game
A fun puzzle game with entertaining voiceovers. Some puzzles do require a little manual dexterity, unless I just figured out a harder way to complete them than the intended solution.
It's Portal. It's great. It really doesn't need my recommendation.
If you have a sense of humour and like fps/puzzle games- your wrong for not having played this game
내인생 최고의 코옵!!!
d+
Das Spiel ist GEIIIL !! :D
Pretty much everything you'd want in a sequel.
Ачишуенная игра

This game has the most mindblowingly awsome ending of any game I've ever played. I didn't own Portal 2 at the time but after finishing it I swore I was going to buy it the first chance I get. The ending is so good that I actually watch a playthrough of it on youtube pretty reguarly . If you haven't played this game, you should. Valve knows how to write their games and this is their best gem so far.
SPAAACE! :D
Збс
Игра, в которую интересно будет играть абсолютно любому. Еще один шедевр от Valve
Masterpiece!!!
Great story and fun atmosphere along with a potentially unlimited playability due to the easy puzzle editor and workshop.
Most original game in a long time, lots of great humor and a very good, if not the best, coop experience.
Besides the incredible and hilarious solo campaign, the co-op initiative takes Portal to another level. One of the most fun puzzle games out there.
За прохождение дают тортик! Честно!

The game is worth every price: good plot, awesome characters, fine puzzles. The workshop and its community pushes this game to next level.

Update: This game was good. Now is worthless. If you have more than 28 logical processors in your CPU, the game simply crashes at loading. They now abou itt for few years, but they are too lazy to correct it. The support is completly useless.

Update: Game was fixed.

디스이즈게임 원사운드님의 만화를 보고 멀티를 정말 해보고 싶었는데 같이 할 사람이 없어서 싱글로만....ㅜ.ㅜ
1에 이어지는 스토리도 재미있고 좀더 스케일이 커진 것 같은 느낌.
재미는 엄청 있음.
게임 하는 사람이라면 포털2는 꼭 해봐야 함!
산지 한참 됐는데 아직 엔딩을 못 봤다..헤헤;

Just finished Portal 2 and all I can say is wow. Portal 1 is basically a glorified (still amazing) tutorial in comparison. Builds on what was great about the first game -- deeper, expanded storyline, bigger, better levels, etc. Portal 2 adds hilarious and diabolical new characters, fun new substances to play around with in addtion to portals, and really deepens (har har) the world that is the Aperture Science salt mine. Bundled with Portal for $5, this is one of the best deals on Steam and has quickly become one of my favorite games.

Well, here we are again... it's always such a pleasure.
O por lo menos eso dice GLaDOS en esta nueva entrega de Portal, IMPERDIBLE. Excelente historia y divertidísimo modo Cooperativo. Incluso se puede jugar con gente que juega desde una PlayStation 3!
Es un  juegazo sin duda y cada parte del juego puede ser realmente dificil de superar,por eso este juego se lleva un 10 sin duda
Very fun game. Much longer than the original and even better to play with friends! Story line is great as well!
This game is the ultimate creation of Valve. Forget Half-Life, this game is where it's at.
Tão bom quanto o primeiro.
A genius puzzle game! The dialogues are very funny and smart. The gameplay is also very good. It has a steam workshop so after the campaign there is a lot to download from there!

Любите пазлы с элементами шутера? Тогда эта игра для вас! Море экшена, суперская история, физика достойная оскора, теперь присутсвует и кооперативный режим, и все это в игре Portal 2. Также это игра для меня удивительна тем, что я такой человек которому, мало что интересно и  я могу бросить игру еще на половине, но что бы пройти ее 3 раза, поверьте эта игра поразила меня.
Nagyon jó a coop része.Érdemes rá beruházni
This game is awesome!

Este é um jogo excelente, co-op muito bom também.
Dica: Jogueo o 1° antes!
Um dos jogos mais sensacionais que já joguei. Exige raciocínio o tempo todo pra ver as possibilidades de resolver os puzzles. Obrigatório ter!
Easter Eggs, hilarious dialog, challengingly solvable puzzles, level creator, coop, and much much more. This game is definately worth every penny. I strongly reccomend  you play it.
Solo para mentes duras, impresionante.
Para ser tan sencillo es demasiado bueno, inteligencia para pasar los niveles.
One of the best endings ever.
Es un juegazo!!! Excelente guion y experiencia, de lo mejor que he jugado :D
Now you're thinking with Portals.
Думай портально.
science ys plss
Really fun if you can stand weird sassiness from your games  - looking for adventurous gamers to do Co-Op!
Great game, lots of fun especially in co-op.
Probably the best puzzle FPS you'll ever play. Amazing writing and fun, absorbing gameplay. Always new user-generated content and I haven't even gotten to the co-op.
그냥 하라고
Suite du premier, le second opus marque un coups encore plus exaltant avec de la coop' et des maps en ligne ( communautaire ) !

One of the best games that Valve has ever made. Valve specializes itsself in making better sequences than the original, and Portal came with more characters, more story and more elements that only add to the original. Portal 2 is required for those who like puzzles and good gaming.

Why don't you already have this?

The game's a very funny experience, recomendable for all ages (not really), the campaign is a lot longer than in the first Portal with charming characters and a lot of silly jokes

So what are you waitin'? Just buy the damn game already...
Great puzzle game. Characters will grab your attention. Memorable.
this game is so fun but after a while its melts you mind

Excelente juego, no solo la parte grafica sino la jugabilidad y el tipo de juego.
Buy it
One of my all time favourite games. Takes  a lot of thinking to get past some chambers, but all in all, great story, great gameplay, great CO-OP!
muy entretenido tiene muchos puzzles, es bastante rejugable y el multiplayer es muy bueno aun que es bueno jugarlo con un amigo para asi no tener problemas de coordinacion.

Portal 2 is an awesome game that has a great story line as well as great and funny characters. This si an excellent  game for any kid who's parrents don't want them playing bloody violent first person shooters like Call of Duty or Metal of Honor. I highly recomend this game for all ages.

what a fucking nice game.

Immernoch eins meiner Lieblingsgames :D Geile Story geiles Gameplay und die Grafiken sind auch geil. Da Valve leider net bis 3 Zählen kann (;D) Werde ich wohl auf Portal 4 warten müssen.

Muy buena ambientación, buen guión y añade cosas interesantes a la jugabilidad de Portal 1. Digna secuela, y era difícil.
